hero.headline: Aaf Afiatna
hero.subtext: I build interactive, modern web experiences that combine meaningful design with powerful performance.

bio: Hi! I'm a professional Web Developer based in Indonesia. I specialize in building high-quality websites and applications using modern technologies like Next.js and WordPress.

With a strong background in SEO, I don't just build websites that look goodâ€”I ensure they perform well in search engines and deliver results. My goal is to bridge the gap between stunning design and technical performance.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new web trends or optimizing content strategies.

projects.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
